ai-patthana21.22:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.22:1.1_0: One should not give a teaching for the sake of happiness, nor for the sake of rapture, because of that arises with happiness.
ai-patthana21.22:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.22:2.1_0: One should not give a teaching for the sake of pleasure and happiness, and for the sake of bliss.
ai-patthana21.22:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.22:3.1_0: Equanimity for the sake of equanimity, nor for the sake of equanimity arises dependent on the pair of equanimity.
ai-patthana21.22:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
